meanings.definition: (ラテン語)中傷する、けなす、悪口を言う
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to disparage, slander, detract from, speak ill of

examples.translation: 他人の評判を中傷する。

etymology.value: ラテン語の「ob-」（反対に）+ 「tractare」（扱う、引きずる）から。文字通りには「引きずり下ろす」という意味合い。

verb_forms.present_indicative: obtrecto, obtrectas, obtrectat, obtrectamus, obtrectatis, obtrectant
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: obtrectabam, obtrectabas, obtrectabat, obtrectabamus, obtrectabatis, obtrectabant
verb_forms.future_indicative: obtrectabo, obtrectabis, obtrectabit, obtrectabimus, obtrectabitis, obtrectabunt
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: obtrectavi, obtrectavisti, obtrectavit, obtrectavimus, obtrectavistis, obtrectaverunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: obtrectaveram, obtrectaveras, obtrectaverat, obtrectaveramus, obtrectaveratis, obtrectaverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: obtrectavero, obtrectaveris, obtrectaverit, obtrectaverimus, obtrectaveritis, obtrectaverint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: obtrectem, obtrectes, obtrectet, obtrectemus, obtrectetis, obtrectent
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: obtrectarem, obtrectares, obtrectaret, obtrectaremus, obtrectaretis, obtrectarent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: obtrectaverim, obtrectaveris, obtrectaverit, obtrectaverimus, obtrectaveritis, obtrectaverint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: obtrectavissem, obtrectavisses, obtrectavisset, obtrectavissemus, obtrectavissetis, obtrectavissent

usage_notes.explanation: 「obtrectare」は古典ラテン語の動詞で、主に他者の評判や価値を貶める行為を指します。現代語ではあまり使われませんが、古典文学や法律文書などで見られます。

derivatives: obtrectator (名詞: 中傷者、悪口を言う人)
